data.event: It was founded in 1715 by the family Camacho Sabidos, in the lead of the Spanish Captain Jos√© Camacho Sabidos and management of Don Juan de Herrera and Tovar, according to church records of the year 1713.

event.title: celebrate the following festivities: - Festivity of Virgen el Carmen (16 July

data.event: People in Guadalupe celebrate the following festivities: - Festivity of Virgen el Carmen (16 July) - Festivity of Virgen de Guadalupe (12 December) - Ferias y Fiestas (Fairs and Feasts), generally on the 2nd week of January.
